item.title: HAProxy as a reverse proxy
item.description: The IBM Cloudant helps you build a flexible disaster recovery capability into your applications through a cross-region disaster recovery setup using either active-passive or active-active configuration. For either configuration, IBM Cloudant doesn’t provide a facility to manage explicitly any failover or reroute requests between Cloudant regions and has to be implemented within the application logic itself, or by using a load balancer/proxy. To enable auto-failover, we can put an HTTP proxy server in front of IBM Cloudant and then configure our application to talk to the proxy server rather than the IBM Cloudant instance directly.
